## IVariableMap.renameVariable() method

Changes the name of the given variable to the name provided and returns the renamed variable.

**Signature:**

```typescript
renameVariable(variable: T, newName: string): T;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  variable | T |  |
|  newName | string |  |

**Returns:**

T
